Ultrasound First

Ultrasound First is a family owned and operated medical practice. We specialize in musculoskeletal ultrasound, a type of ultrasound focusing on bones, muscles, tendons, ligaments and soft tissues. This is often a cheaper alternative to more expensive imaging methods like MRI and CAT scans. I am currently employed at Ultrasound First to work on and maintain the website, as well as managing our social media presence.

When I was hired the website was already created, but had an outdated design, and some clunky features. So my initial job was to renovate the website to a more modern look and feel.

The website was created in wordpress, something I wasn’t used to quite yet. However it didn’t take long for me to wrap my head around the way the themes worked, and once I got that done it was easy. I used themes to make the website have a more modern feel, instead of the themeless style before. I then went into the source code of the theme and edited the PHP to make the site appear more of the style I wanted it to. That combined with custom CSS allowed me to make the website look how I wanted.

The website as of right now is still being updated with new articles every once in a while, which I edit, and publish to our posts page. This process is pretty easy to do, as the article is already written. When an article comes to me I skim through it for any spelling and or grammatical errors. Once this is done, I add pictures to the article. When the article is already to be published, I then perform search engine optimization. This is the process of adding metadata and other information that search engines use so that it has a greater chance to choose our article over similar ones.
